thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com
thread.title: Allison Vieira Goericke
thread.title_full: Jomashop reviewed by Allison Vieira Goericke

author: Allison Vieira Goericke
title: Allison Vieira Goericke
text: I purchased a Michael Kors handbag and was nervous about going through a store I hadn't heard of before...Thought the great prices were too good to be true and I might get a knockoff. Well, I was SO happy with my experience. Emails were sent immediately after purchase, I got my bag super fast, delivered all packaged nice and safe and in perfect condition. LOVE the bag and would definitely shop here again!
